content.text:
# King Dennis

Kelvin Justice Dennis (born 30 March), known professionally as King Dennis, is a Liberian singer and songwriter. He is known for his contributions to Hipco and Afropop music in Liberia and for multiple nominations at the MTN Liberia Music Awards.
Early life and career
King Dennis was born and raised in Liberia. Under the mentorship of Liberian businessman and talent manager Lyee Bility, he began developing his music career. He gained national attention with his freestyle "Hipco Alphabet", which highlighted his lyrical ability and became recognized as an influential contribution to Liberia's contemporary music scene. He has released several singles and extended plays, including "Trouble Coming" (2023) and "Next Chapter" (2024), which have been covered by independent media sources.
Media coverage
King Dennis has been featured in multiple independent publications for his contributions to the Liberian music scene. Coverage includes interviews, music reviews, and live performances:
* Knews Online – featured for radio interviews and music showcases.
* Liberian Investigator – reported on his artistic style and releases.
* FrontPage Africa – covered public reactions to his music.
* ProQuest – newspaper coverage of live performances.

* "Zowahlazo" (featuring MC Caro, 2025)
